select SQL_CALC_FOUND_ROWS AA.chck_date, AA.chck_kind, AA.chck_judge, AA.chck_hspt, AA.chck_doctor, AA.report_id, AA.user_id, AA.upt_dt, case when IFNULL (cast(BB.BAD_VAL AS CHAR), '') = '' then BB.BAD_VAL when cast(BB.BAD_VAL AS CHAR) = '0' then BB.BAD_VAL when BB.BAD_VAL < 0 then BB.BAD_VAL else CONCAT('+', cast(BB.BAD_VAL AS CHAR)) end BAD_VAL from T_WLK_REPORT AA, ( select report.chck_date, report.user_id, max(report.upt_dt) as upt_dt from t_wlk_report report, t_wlk_nutri_anly anly where report.user_id = anly.USER_ID and report.upt_dt is not null group by report.chck_date, report.user_id ) CC left outer join T_WLK_NUTRI_ANLY BB on CC.USER_ID = BB.USER_ID and DATE_FORMAT(CC.UPT_DT,'%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(BB.RCV_DT,'%Y-%m-%d') WHERE AA.USER_ID = CC.USER_ID AND AA.CHCK_DATE = CC.CHCK_DATE and AA.UPT_DT = CC.UPT_DT
AND AA.chck_kind IN ('${chckKind}')
AND AA.chck_date >= '${searchBgnDe}'
AND AA.chck_date <= '${searchEndDe}'
order by AA.CHCK_DATE desc LIMIT #{rowNo}, #{rows}
